alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Campbell; Knox; Loudon; Morgan; Roane (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 3:27AM CDT until April 01 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Morgan County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Loudon County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Knox County in east Tennessee... Western Anderson County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Campbell County in east Tennessee... Roane County in east Tennessee... * Until 500 AM EDT. * At 427 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Midtown, or near Rockwood, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Knoxville, Oak Ridge, Clinton, Lenoir City, Kingston, Rockwood, Farragut, Fairview, Oliver Springs and Midtown. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 341 and 380. Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 82 and 84. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM EDT for east Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Campbell; Knox; Loudon; Morgan; Roane
